table.name: vtiger_import_locks
table.sql: CREATE TABLE vtiger_import_locks (vtiger_import_lock_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, userid INT NOT NULL, tabid INT NOT NULL, importid INT NOT NULL, locked_since DATETIME) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci

table.name: vtiger_import_queue
table.sql: CREATE TABLE vtiger_import_queue (importid INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, userid INT NOT NULL, tabid INT NOT NULL, field_mapping TEXT, default_values TEXT, merge_type INT, merge_fields TEXT, status INT default 0) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci

cron.name: Scheduled Import
cron.description: The recommended frequency for Imports is 15 minutes.
